main.name: Michael Hines
main.description: Computer Science Student | Aspiring Software Engineer | Fitness Enthusiast
main.bio: Originally from the Washington D.C. area, I'm a senior Computer Science student at the University of Notre Dame's College of Engineering, with a minor in Engineering Corporate Practice. After graduation, I'll be joining IBM as an Associate Security Consultant. I'm passionate about leveraging technology for good, exploring generative AI, and embracing continuous growth - whether mentoring students, developing software, or pushing myself in the gym.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to reach out to me for any opportunities or collaborations:

resume.skillmessage: Proficient in full-stack development, embedded system design, and software engineering practices:

education.school: University of Notre Dame - College of Engineering | Notre Dame, IN
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, Minor in Engineering Corporate Practice
education.description: GPA: 3.9 | Activities/Societies: Strength & Weight Training, ND Powerlifting Club, Morrissey Hall Government and St. Andr√© Committee, Jam ND (Drummer), Interhall Soccer
Completed a six-week summer study abroad program through the University of Notre Dame's College of Engineering, taking two electrical engineering courses while gaining valuable cultural experience.

education.school: St. Stephen's and St. Agnes School | Alexandria, VA
education.description: GPA: 4.0 | Activities/Societies: Salutatorian, Head's List (2017-2021), Cum Laude Society, Jazz Ensemble (Drummer), Stage One Players Set Design and Construction Crew, Asians Coming Together Club, JV/Varsity Soccer, Latin Honors Society, Saints Mathletes

work.title: Teaching Assistant
work.description: Hosted weekly office hours to mentor students in complex problem-solving techniques and code debugging, while grading assignments with an emphasis on algorithmic efficiency, appropriate data structures, and best software engineering practices.

work.title: Brand Ambassador
work.description: Pioneered a campus-wide marketing campaign for Yelo (previously Desi), a student-founded social ride network, achieving over 2,500 downloads (15% of ND students) and successfully onboarding 120+ student drivers within the first month.

projects.title: AI Personal Trainer
projects.category: Currently developing a trainer using ChatGPT API for personalized strength/weight training analysis.

projects.title: Wordle Web Application
projects.category: A Wordle-inspired game using Python, Django, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, featuring user authentication, gameplay mechanics, player dashboard, and in-game purchases.

projects.title: Valentine's Proposal Website
projects.category: A simple but charming web page built with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS to ask someone special to be your Valentine.

projects.title: Personal Website
projects.category: A personal website built with React, showcasing my skills, projects, and experience.
